v1NetworkAreaID.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network Area.
v1NetworkAreaID.name: areaId

v1NetworkID.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network.
v1NetworkID.name: networkId

v1NetworkRangeID.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Network Range.
v1NetworkRangeID.name: networkRangeId

v1OrganizationID.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Organization.
v1OrganizationID.name: organizationId

v1ProjectID.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Project.
v1ProjectID.name: projectId

v1RequestID.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Request.
v1RequestID.name: requestId

v1RouteID.description: The identifier (ID) of a STACKIT Route.
v1RouteID.name: routeId

value.msg: The server group policy is not supported
boot device size is not valid or missing
request body has an error: doesn't match schema: Error at "/name": value must be a string

InternalServerError.description: Internal Server Error, returns a 500 if something is broken on IaaS API Side.

Unauthorized.description: A request which was not authorized.

Area.description: The basic properties of a network area.

AreaDefaultPrefixLengthIPv4.description: The default prefix length for networks in the network area.

AreaMaxPrefixLengthIPv4.description: The maximal prefix length for networks in the network area.

AreaMinPrefixLengthIPv4.description: The minimal prefix length for networks in the network area.

AreaPrefixConfigIPv4.description: The IPv4 prefix config for a network area.

CreateAreaAddressFamily.description: The addressFamily object for a area create request.

CreateAreaIPv4.description: The config object for a IPv4 network area.

CreateNetworkAddressFamily.description: The addressFamily object for a network create request.

CreateNetworkIPv4Body.description: The config object for an IPv4 network.

CreateNetworkIPv6Body.description: The config object for an IPv6 network.

CreateNetworkPayload.description: Object that represents the request body for a network create.

Error.description: Error with HTTP error code and an error message.

GenericName.description: The name for a General Object. Matches Names and also UUIDs.

IP.description: Object that represents an IP address.

IPv6.description: Object that represents an IPv6 address.

Labels.description: Object that represents the labels of an object.

Nameserver.description: A list containing DNS Servers/Nameservers for IPv4.

Nameserverv6.description: A list containing DNS Servers/Nameservers for IPv6.

NetworkArea.description: Object that represents a network area.

NetworkAreaIPv4.description: The IPv4 properties of a network area.

NetworkRange.description: Object that represents a network range.

PartialUpdateNetworkPayload.description: Object that represents the request body for a network update.

ProjectCount.description: The amount of projects currently referencing a specific area.

ReqId.description: Identifier (ID) representing a single API request.

RequestResource.description: Object that represents a resource as part of a request.

Resource.description: Object that represents a resource type.

ResourceAction.description: Object that represents a resource action.

ResourceState.description: The state of a resource object.

UpdateAreaAddressFamily.description: The addressFamily object for a area update request.

UpdateAreaIPv4.description: The update object for a IPv4 network area.

UpdateNetworkAddressFamily.description: The addressFamily object for a network update request.

UpdateNetworkIPv4Body.description: The config object for a IPv4 network update.

UpdateNetworkIPv6Body.description: The config object for a IPv6 network update.

UpdatedAt.description: Date-time when resource was last updated.

v1NetworkGateway.description: The gateway of a network. If not specified the first ip of the network will be assigned as the gateway. If 'null' is sent, then the network doesn't have a gateway.

v1Routed.description: Shows if the network is routed and therefore accessible from other networks.

info.description: This API allows you to create and modify IaaS resources.
info.title: IaaS-API

get.description: Get a list of all visible network areas defined in an organization.

200.description: Get a list of all network areas.

get.summary: List all network areas in an organization.

post.description: Create a new network area in an organization.
post.summary: Create new network area in an organization.

delete.description: Delete an existing network area in an organization. This is only possible if no projects are using the area anymore.

202.description: Delete request for area has been accepted.

get.description: Get details about a network area in an organization.
get.summary: Get details about a network area.

patch.description: Update the settings of a network area in an organization.

get.description: Get a list of all network ranges in a network area.
get.summary: List all network ranges in a network area.

post.description: Create a new network range in an existing network area.

requestBody.description: Request an addition of network ranges to an area.

post.summary: Create new network range in a network area.

delete.description: Delete a network range of a network area. The deletion will fail if the network range is still used.

202.description: Delete request for network range accepted.

get.description: Get details about a network range in a network area.
get.summary: Get details about a network range.

get.description: Get a list of all projects using a network area.

200.description: List projects for a network area.

get.summary: List all projects using a network area.

get.description: Get a list of all network routes defined in a network area.
get.summary: List all network routes in a network area.

post.description: Create one or several new network routes in a network area.

requestBody.description: Request an addition of routes to an area.

202.description: Create request for network routes accepted.

delete.description: Delete a network route of a network area.

202.description: Delete request for the network route has been accepted.

get.description: Get details about a network route defined in a network area.
get.summary: Get details about a network route.

get.description: Lookup an organization request ID from a previous request. This allows to find resource IDs of resources generated during a organization request.
Get a list of all networks inside a project.

200.description: List all networks of a project.

get.summary: List all networks inside a project.

post.description: Create a new network in a project. `nameservers` will be filled from `defaultNameservers` of the respective area if not specified. If the project has `internetAccess` enabled and this is the first network in the project this might incur cost.

delete.description: Delete a network. If the network is still in use, the deletion will fail.

202.description: Delete request for network has been accepted.

get.description: Get details about a network of a project.

patch.description: Update the settings of a network inside a project.

requestBody.description: Request an update of a network.

get.description: Lookup a project request ID from a previous request. This allows to find resource IDs of resources generated during a projects request.
